issue-type-scheme.name: rehabstudio Template Issue Type Scheme
issue-type-scheme.description: The issue type scheme suited to the default rehabstudio Template Workflow

issue-types.name: New Feature
issue-types.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.

issue-types.name: Bug
issue-types.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

issue-types.name: Epic
issue-types.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

issue-types.name: Improvement
issue-types.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.

issue-types.name: Overtime
issue-types.description: This issue type should be assigned to any overtime tasks

issue-types.name: QA
issue-types.description: A task for a QA team member to do

issue-types.name: Task
issue-types.description: A task that needs to be done

issue-types.name: Technical task
issue-types.description: A task for devs only - no production time or notes should be made here
